1/22/2020.quote: We have it totally under control. It's one person coming in from China, and we have it under control. It's going to be just fine.

2/2/2020.quote: We pretty much shut it down coming in from China.

2/24/2020.quote: The Coronavirus is very much under control in the USA.

2/26/2020.quote: within a couple of days is going to be down to close to zero, that's a pretty good job we've done.

3/10/2020.quote: we're doing a great job with it. And it will go away. Just stay calm. It will go away.

3/17/2020.quote: This is a pandemic. ... I felt it was a pandemic long before it was called a pandemic.

3/24/2020.quote: Easter is a very special day for me ... wouldn't it be great to have all of the churches full?
